Name: NAFIS: Normalized Arabic Fragments for Inestimable Stemming
License: Non Commercial Use - ELRA END USER
Description: The corpus has the following characteristics: • 37 sentences • The average length of sentences is 5,05 words, with the longest being 10 words • Declarative, interrogative, imperative and exclamatory sentences accounted for 37,84%, 32,43%, 16,22% and 13,51% respectively • 154 tokens with 5,95 solutions as an average number of stemming solutions
